about_the_game:
HoleShot Drag Racing is a semi realistic drag racing game set in the late 1960s.

Game Features :
- Full engine building with ability to modify :
- Short Block - Camshaft - Cylinder Heads - Intakes - Fuel - Ignition - Exhaust



Chassis :
- A variety of chassis with ability to modify :
- WheelBase Length - Engine Position - Ballast - Weight Balance - AntiSquat


- Weather system that effects track conditions and how you tune your motor and setup the vehicle

- Full Vehicle customization with many different bodies / Paint Shop
- Authentic late 60s based race classes - Gasser / Dragster / Altered
- If you can build it you can race it

MORE TO COME...

name: HoleShot Drag Racing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit, Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: 4 core CPU or better – Some examples (but not limited to): AMD FX-6300, Intel Core i5-4430, Intel Core i5-2320, AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A gaming graphics card with at least 2GB of DEDICATED memory – Some examples (but not limited to): Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 @ 2 GB / GTX 1050 or ATI Radeon HD 7850 @ 2GB / AMD RX 550 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 64-Bit, Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: 8 core or more CPU (some examples but not limited to: Intel Core 9-10980XE @ 3.0GHz, Intel Core i9-9900KS @ 4.00GHz, AMD Ryzen 9 3900X, or AMD Ryzen 9 3950X)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gaming graphics card with at least 8GB of DEDICATED memory (some examples but not limited to Nvidia 2080 TI or AMD Radeon VII) DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 32 GB available space READ MORE
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: HoleShot Drag Racing is a semi realistic drag racing game set in the late 1960s. Build your Car and race it in the glory years of Drag Racing
